data.title: Famous Birthdays on December 21
data.meta_description: Famous birthdays for the 21st of December. See which celebrities, historical figures, scientists and criminals were born on December 21.
data.text:
Birthdays 1 - 200 of 238

Thomas Becket

English Archbishop of Canterbury (1162-70), born in London

Tommaso Masaccio, Italian painter, born in San Giovanni Valdarno, Italy (d. 1428)

Mark van Vaernewijck, Habsburg historian, born in Ghent, County of Flanders, Habsburg Netherlands (d. 1569)

Petro Mohyla, Moldovan Orthodox Metropolitan Bishop of Kiev and Galicia (d. 1646)

Roger Williams

English theologian and colonist, born in London, England

Pietro Andrea Ziani, Italian organist and composer, born in Venice (d. 1684)

Samuel Friedrich Capricornus, Czech composer, born in Žerčice, Czech Republic (d. 1665)

John Bradstreet, Canadian-born soldier, born in Annapolis Royal, Canada (d. 1774)

Hermann Friedrich Raupach, German composer, born in Stralsund, Germany (d. 1778)

Thomas Anton Kunz, Czech composer, born in Prague, Kingdom of Bohemia (now Czech Republic) (d. 1830)

Anders Sandøe Ørsted, Danish politician, born in Rudkøbing, Denmark (d. 1860)

Leopold von Ranke

German historian who founded the modern concept of source-based history, born in Wiehe, Saxony, Holy Roman Empire

Barnwell Rhett Robert, (Confederacy), (d. 1876)

Benjamin Disraeli

Thomas Bracken, Irish-born New Zealand poet, born in Clones, County Monaghan (d. 1898)
